title: User signup with valid email and password
description: Verify that a new user can sign up successfully using a valid email and password combination.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Enter a valid email address and password
Submit the signup form
Confirm account creation and redirect to an empty dashboard

title: User signin and session management
description: Check that a registered user can sign in with correct credentials and that the session is handled correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the signin page
Enter valid user credentials
Submit the signin form
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard and authenticated session is established

title: User signout and session termination
description: Ensure that signing out terminates the user session and redirects to the signin page.

steps.description: From an authenticated dashboard, click the signout button
User session is terminated and redirected to the signin page

title: Create a new interview session with audio recording
description: Test creating a new session specifying interview type with audio recording and starting recording in-browser.

steps.description: Navigate to create new session page
Fill session form with title, type as interview, recording type as audio, and optional company context
Submit the form to create the session
Start audio recording in browser
Recording starts successfully

title: Create a new trading session with video recording
description: Verify the user can create a trading session with video recording and start recording successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to new session creation page
Enter session details with type trading, video recording, and associated trading symbol
Create the session
Start in-browser video recording
Video recording starts and UI updates accordingly

title: Stop recording and upload to Supabase Storage
description: Validate that stopping the recording uploads audio/video files to secure storage and updates session status.

steps.description: While recording is active, stop recording
The recorded media file is uploaded successfully to Supabase Storage
Session status changes to ready for review

title: Playback controls for recorded session
description: Test play, pause, seek, and speed adjustment controls for audio/video playback.

steps.description: Open a recorded session for playback
Use playback controls to play and pause
Seek to different timestamps
Adjust playback speed
Playback responds correctly to all controls including seeking and speed changes

title: Add, edit, and delete timestamped bookmarks during playback
description: Verify users can create bookmarks at playback timestamps, edit categories and descriptions, delete bookmarks, and navigate quickly.

steps.description: Start playback of a recorded session
Add a bookmark at the current timestamp with a category
Bookmark is added and shown in the bookmarks list
Edit the bookmark's category and description
Bookmark updates are saved and reflected
Delete the bookmark
Bookmark is removed from the list
Click a bookmark to navigate playback to its timestamp
Playback jumps correctly to bookmark timestamp

title: Add and auto-save session-level notes
description: Check that users can add notes for a session that auto-save and persist after page reload.

steps.description: Open session note editor
Type notes content
Notes auto-save after inactivity or specific intervals
Reload session page
Previously entered notes are loaded correctly

title: Manual transcript editing with search and highlighting
description: Validate that transcripts can be pasted, manually edited, searched, and highlighted for keywords.

steps.description: Open transcript editor for a session
Paste transcript text and perform manual edits
Transcript updates are saved successfully
Use the search function to find specific keywords
All matches of the keyword are highlighted in transcript

title: Queue AI job for transcription and verify result
description: Test queuing a transcription job, monitor job processing status, and validate transcription output correctness.

steps.description: Open AI actions panel for a recorded session
Queue a transcription AI job
Job status updates from queued to processing to completed
Transcript output is generated and accessible for review

title: AI job error handling and retry
description: Ensure the system handles AI job failures gracefully and supports user retry of failed jobs.

steps.description: Simulate a failure in AI job processing
Job status changes to failed and an error message is shown
Trigger retry of the failed job
Job is re-queued and processed again successfully

title: Generate and revoke secure session share link
description: Verify generating a token-based share link provides read-only access and that revoking the link disables access.

steps.description: Generate a share link for a recorded session
Link is generated and can be copied
Access the session via share link in an incognito browser
Session content is viewable with read-only permissions, no editing allowed
Revoke the generated share link
Attempt to access the session again via revoked link
Access is denied or link is invalid

title: Dashboard session list filtering and pagination
description: Test the dashboard filters by session type and pagination to verify correct sessions display and navigation.

steps.description: Open the main dashboard with multiple sessions present
Apply filter by session type: interview
Only interview sessions are listed
Change filter to trading sessions
Only trading sessions are displayed
Use pagination controls to navigate to next page
Next set of sessions is displayed

title: Verify Row Level Security enforces data privacy
description: Ensure a user can only access their own sessions and any shared sessions according to RLS policies.

steps.description: Log in as User A and attempt to access User B's private session via direct URL
Access is denied or session is not found
Log in as User B and verify access to own sessions
User B can view all own sessions
Access a session shared with User A via token-based share link
User A can view shared session with read-only rights

title: Company and symbol management functionality
description: Check creation, update, and deletion of company and trading symbols for organizing sessions.

steps.description: Create a new target company entity with valid data
Company is created and listed
Edit the company's name or details
Company updates are saved and reflected
Delete the company
Company is removed from the list
Perform similar operations for trading symbols
Symbols are managed correctly

title: UI responsiveness and theme toggling
description: Verify that UI is responsive across different devices and switching between dark and light themes works correctly with system preference detection.

steps.description: Open the application on multiple screen sizes including mobile and desktop
UI adapts correctly without layout issues
Toggle theme switch to dark mode
UI theme changes to dark mode immediately
Toggle theme switch back to light mode
UI theme changes to light mode
Set system theme preference to dark and reload app
App loads with dark theme by default

title: Error boundary displays fallback UI on unexpected errors
description: Ensure that global and route-level error boundaries catch errors and display a user-friendly fallback UI.

steps.description: Trigger a runtime error in a route or component
Error boundary intercepts the error and displays fallback UI
Navigate back to a valid page
Application recovers and functions normally
